title: Post-Closing Client Follow-Up
description: A transaction closed last week. The agent needs to follow up with the client and ask for a review.

tasks.description: Identify clients whose transactions closed between 7 and 14 days ago.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the recent client.

tasks.description: Send a follow-up email to the client, checking in to see how they are settling in.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a personalized, thoughtful email.

tasks.description: In the email, include a link for the client to leave a review on Zillow or Yelp.
